javadoc:
An icon that allows sub-icons to be added at key perimeter locations. Each position can 
 be manipulated independently, adding and removing icons as desired. Additionally, 
 each position can be toggled enabled or disabled, or visible or invisible.

methods.name: addBadge
methods.comment: Add an icon at the specified location

methods.name: setBadge
methods.comment: Replace the existing icon with the provided icon at the specified location

methods.name: removeBadge
methods.comment: Remove the badge from the specified location

methods.name: setBadgeEnabled
methods.comment: Set the enablement of the badge at the specified location

params.name: enabled
params.comment: True if the image should be shown 'enabled', false otherwise

methods.name: isBadgeEnabled
methods.comment: Get the enablement status of the badge at the specified location

return.comment: True if the badge is enabled, false otherwise

methods.name: setBadgeVisisble
methods.comment: Set the visibility status of the badge at the specified location

params.name: visible
params.comment: True if the badge should be visible, false otherwise

methods.name: isBadgeVisible
methods.comment: Get the visibility status of the badge at the specified location

methods.javadoc:
Determine the overall enablement appearance state.
@return true if the if the entire icon is rendered as 'enabled'; false otherwise.
methods.name: isEnabled
methods.comment: Determine the overall enablement appearance state.

return.comment: true if the if the entire icon is rendered as 'enabled'; false otherwise.

methods.javadoc: Set the 'enabled' appearance of the entire icon. Preserves the underlying enablement state of badges, though the entire icon looks disabled if setEnabled(true) is called. @param enabled
methods.name: setEnabled
methods.comment:
Set the 'enabled' appearance of the entire icon.
 Preserves the underlying enablement state of badges, though the entire icon
 looks disabled if setEnabled(true) is called.

methods.javadoc: Return array of Icons that were added to this BadgedIcon.
methods.name: getBadges
methods.comment: Return array of Icons that were added to this BadgedIcon.

name: BadgedIcon
comment:
An icon that allows sub-icons to be added at key perimeter locations. Each position can 
 be manipulated independently, adding and removing icons as desired. Additionally, 
 each position can be toggled enabled or disabled, or visible or invisible.
